title: Chlorofresh® Chlorophyll Concentrate | Nature's Way®
description: Softgels containing a chlorophyllin complex that supports antioxidant pathways and detoxification processes, helps neutralize free radicals.*
cleaned_text: | Gluten Free [View full details](/products/chlorofresh-chlorophyll-concentrate) Product information Chlorofresh® Chlorophyll Concentrate Supports Detoxification Pathways* Chlorofresh softgels contain a chlorophyllin complex that supports antioxidant pathways and detoxification processes and helps neutralize free radicals.* Chlorophyllin copper complex supports collagen synthesis for healthy skin and keeps you feeling fresh by working as an internal deodorant.* These convenient capsules help you enjoy the fresh benefits of Chlorofresh. Supports Detoxification Pathways* Chlorofresh softgels contain a chlorophyllin complex that supports antioxidant pathways and detoxification processes and helps neutralize free radicals.* Chlorophyllin copper complex supports collagen synthesis for healthy skin and keeps you feeling fresh by working as an internal deodorant.* These convenient capsules help you enjoy the fresh benefits of Chlorofresh. We Go Where Herbs Grow Best At Nature's Way, we believe that nature knows best, and that the gifts of nature can enrich your wellness journey. We travel across the globe to source herbs from the continents and climates where they grow best. It's how we deliver the uncompromising quality we're known for to help you live your healthiest life. We Go Where Herbs Grow Best At Nature's Way, we believe that nature knows best, and that the gifts of nature can enrich your wellness journey. We travel across the globe to source herbs from the continents and climates where they grow best. It's how we deliver the uncompromising quality we're known for to help you live your healthiest life. Product Highlights Supports Antioxidant Pathways* Chlorofresh is made with a liquid chlorophyllin complex to help neutralize free radicals.* Supports Antioxidant Pathways* Chlorofresh is made with a liquid chlorophyllin complex to help neutralize free radicals.* Supports Healthy Skin* The chlorophyllin copper complex supports collagen synthesis for healthy skin.* Supports Healthy Skin* The chlorophyllin copper complex supports collagen synthesis for healthy skin.* Keeps You Feeling Fresh* Chlorofresh also works as an internal deodorant.* Keeps You Feeling Fresh* Chlorofresh also works as an internal deodorant.* Supports Antioxidant Pathways* Chlorofresh is made with a liquid chlorophyllin complex to help neutralize free radicals.* Supports Healthy Skin* The chlorophyllin copper complex supports collagen synthesis for healthy skin.* Keeps You Feeling Fresh* Chlorofresh also works as an internal deodorant.* 10 Calories <1g Total Fat 4.5mg Copper (from Chlorophyllin copper complex from White Mulberry leaf) 10mg Sodium 100mg Chlorophyllin (from Chlorophyllin copper complex from White Mulberry leaf) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Chlorofresh® Chlorophyll Concentrate Does Not Contain Yeast - Derived Ingredient Wheat Gluten Corn Dairy Other Details UPC: 358008035501 SKU: 3550 Chlorofresh® Chlorophyll Concentrate Directions and/or DosageAdults: Take 2 softgels once daily. Do not exceed recommended dosage. Children under age 18: consult a healthcare professional before use. WarningReduce the dosage if cramps or diarrhea occur. If symptoms persist, stop use and consult a healthcare professional. If you are pregnant, nursing, or taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
